is_roi_overlap_segment.description: Refine segmentation mask by overlaying ROI class. Disable when semantic segmentation accuracy is sufficient.

overlap_roi_score_threshold.description: Minimum existence probability of detected ROI to replace segmentation.

is_publish_color_mask.description: Enable or disable publishing color masks for result visualization.

roi_overlay_segment_label.description: Specify which labels to refine in segmentation using ROI.

model_path.description: Path to the ONNX file for the YOLOX model.

label_path.description: Path to the label file for the YOLOX model.

color_map_path.description: Path to the semantic segmentation color map file.

score_threshold.description: Threshold for object detection scores. Objects with scores below this value are ignored.

nms_threshold.description: Threshold for Non-Maximum Suppression (NMS). Detections with IoU above this value are ignored.

precision.description: Operation precision for inference. Valid options: [fp32, fp16, int8].

calibration_algorithm.description: Calibration algorithm for quantization when precision is int8. Valid options: [Entropy, (Legacy | Percentile), MinMax].

dla_core_id.description: DLA core ID for inference. If positive, assigns inference task to the specified DLA core.

quantize_first_layer.description: Enable fp16 precision for the first (input) layer when precision is int8.

quantize_last_layer.description: Enable fp16 precision for the last (output) layer when precision is int8.

profile_per_layer.description: Enable profiling for each layer. Recommended only for development purposes.

clip_value.description: Maximum clipping value for layer outputs. Valid only for int8 precision.

gpu_id.description: GPU ID for selecting the CUDA device.

calibration_image_list_path.description: Path to a file containing image paths for int8 quantization calibration.
